title: Apple is working on a ‘Prince of Tides’ film-to-TV reboot on Apple TV+
content:
Apple TV+ is presently working on a TV reboot of the popular 1990s film, The Prince of Tides. Starring Nick Nolte and Barbra Streisand, the romantic drama is about a man who falls in love with his sister’s psychiatrist as they work through issues from their troubled childhood.

more…

The post Apple is working on a ‘Prince of Tides’ film-to-TV reboot on Apple TV+ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple TV+ is working on a TV reboot of the popular 1990s film starring Barbra Streisand and Nick Nolte, The Prince of Tides.
